text: Create a list and set priority levels for each item.
Add the stores where you shop!
At the store right now? Select the store to only view items from that store.
View previous lists and add some or all of the items to your current one!
Already added an item to your cart?  Mark it as complete to track your progress.
Got a recipe you love?  Save a G-List with all of the ingredients to quickly add to your current list!
Connect with friends and family members!
Send and receive lists from your fellow shoppers.
